header.title: Worktrees
header.description: Manage isolated workspaces for your Auto Claude tasks

errors.title: Error
errors.taskNotFound: Task not found for this worktree

emptyState.selectProject: Select a project to view worktrees
emptyState.title: No Worktrees
emptyState.description: Worktrees are created automatically when Auto Claude builds features. You can also create terminal worktrees from the Agent Terminals tab.

mergeDialog.title: Merge Worktree
mergeDialog.description: Merge changes from this worktree into the base branch.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Worktree?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the worktree and all uncommitted changes.

deleteTerminalDialog.title: Delete Terminal Worktree?
deleteTerminalDialog.description: This will permanently delete the worktree and its branch. Any uncommitted changes will be lost.
